resources.string:
"Welcome to the Star Printer Android SDK!" "
Star Line Mode for Thermal Printers" "

Star Line Mode Printers accept commands and print data line-by-line, as this mode’s name suggests." "
The data is transferred to the printer in small pieces," "
allowing developers to customize receipt output with commands in any place they are needed." "
This mode alone can only make use of Device Fonts installed on the printer," "
which can be less visually appealing than TrueType Fonts." "

By contrast, Star Raster Mode sends all print data graphically to the printer." "
Raster Mode commands enable supported printers to output engaging TrueType Fonts," "
but are more difficult to code for than Line Mode commands." "
Depending on the amount of print data sent at one time," "
Raster Mode printing can result in faster printing than Line Mode printing." "


Star Line Mode Thermal Printers:" "

TSP650" "

TSP650II" "

FVP10" "

TSP700II" "

TSP800II" "

TUP500"

"Welcome to the Star Printer Android SDK!" "
Star Raster Mode for Thermal Printers" "

Star Raster Mode Printers receive all print data graphically," "
allowing them to natively support the printing of engaging TrueType Fonts and output receipts at a lightning fast pace." "
Coding Raster commands is more complicated than Line Mode commands" "
as Raster commands require the entire receipt to be generated in graphical data before being sent to the printer." "

By contrast, Star Line Mode sends all print data in small pieces line-by-line." "
While Line Mode is easier to code for when compared to Raster Mode," "
Line Mode only supports the printer’s native Device Fonts which can sacrifice a fresh design of receipts." "
Additionally, Line Mode can result in slower printing depending on how much print data is sent." "


Star Raster Mode Thermal Printers:," "

TSP100ECO/USB/PUSB" "

TSP100LAN" "

TSP100GT" "

TSP650" "

TSP650II" "

FVP10" "

TSP700II" "

TSP800II" "

TUP500"

"Welcome to the Star Printer Android SDK!" "
ESC/POS Mode for Thermal Printers" "

ESC/POS Mode Printers accept commands and print data." "
The data is transferred to the printer in small pieces," "
allowing developers to customize receipt output with commands in any place they are needed." "
This mode alone can only make use of Device Fonts installed on the printer," "

which can be less visually appealing than TrueType Fonts." "


ESCPOS Mode Thermal Printers:," "

BSC10" "

TSP043" "

BSC10BR" "

TSP650" "

TSP650II" "

FVP10" "

TSP700II" "

TSP800II" "

TUP500"
修理報告書 兼領収書

" お名前：池西 圭子 様" "
 御住所：静岡市清水区七ツ新屋" "
 ５３６番地" "
 伝票番号：No.12345-67890" "

 この度は修理をご用命頂き有難うございます。今後も故障など発生した場合はお気軽にご連絡ください。" "

"
"現在プリンタ通信ポートが混み合っております。"
